name: Profile Test Data
description: Test data(s) for negative profile - personal details scenarios.

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify that data saving fails in the ‘Personal Details’ tab when invalid inputs are provided.

expectedResult.result: The system prevents saving invalid data and an error message is displayed.
expectedResult.message: Invalid date on license expiry field.

fieldErrors.message: Should be a valid date in yyyy-dd-mm format

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify that data saving fails in the ‘Personal Details’ tab when invalid inputs are provided.

expectedResult.result: The system prevents saving invalid data and an error message is displayed.
expectedResult.message: Invalid date on date of birth field.

fieldErrors.message: Should be a valid date in yyyy-dd-mm format

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify that data saving fails in the ‘Personal Details’ tab when invalid inputs are provided.

expectedResult.result: The system prevents saving invalid data and an error message is displayed.
expectedResult.message: Invalid date on license expiry and date of birth fields.

fieldErrors.message: Should be a valid date in yyyy-dd-mm format
